name: SecretBuilders
description:
Check out SecretBuilders brand new iPad and iPhone app. Now you can enjoy playing SecretBuilders, the popular MMO and social gameworld, from anywhere on your phone or tablet! The game includes all your favorite SecretBuilders features such a chat, dress up, fashion shows, pets and your very own home.

Here are just a few of the amazing things you can do on the SecretBuilders app:

• Chat and hang out with friends while exploring lands in our multi-player virtual world
• Enter our live fashion shows for the ultimate dress up competition
• Shop from our extensive clothes shop to dress up in the latest styles
• Throw parties in and decorate your own multi-level treehouse
• Play with and care for the cutest pets including baby dragons and unicorns
